reviews.text: We have just returned from our first visit to Peninsula Cottages. Our home for the week was No 53, a four bedroom property, overlooking the water both front and back. The cottages are situated in a marina, just off of the main Broads. Very peaceful!
reviews.title: Relaxing holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ground floor: Toilet. Open plan kitchen (fridge freezer, microwave, electric cooker) and lounge which leads onto decking (sun comes round in the afternoon)
reviews.title: spring break at wroxham
Good place to stay for a break
reviews.text: First floor: One double, one twin and a bathroom (bath and shower)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Second floor: One double, one twin and a bathroom (electric shower)
reviews.title: No 15
